workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.35677918793403013 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.42390803177156433 --weight-decay 0.000126202815920072 --lr 0.0008457328854409965 --lr-scheduler inverse_sqrt --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --min-lr 1e-9 --warmup-updates 163473 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.08475265731091458 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
